Package uk.ac.cf.milling.utils.db

Class CuttingToolProfileUtils

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.cf.milling.utils.db.CuttingToolProfileUtils
public class CuttingToolProfileUtils extends Object
Methods accessing persistence layer for CuttingToolProfiles creation and management.
Author:
Theocharis Alexopoulos

  • Method Details

    • addCuttingToolProfile

      public static void addCuttingToolProfile​(int toolId, double distanceFromNose, double distanceFromCentre, int insertionsPerTooth, double materialRemoved, boolean axialProfile, boolean radialProfile)
      Parameters:
      toolId - - the tool that the profile refers to
      distanceFromNose - - [mm] distance from the nose of the cutting tool
      insertionsPerTool - - number of times that each tooth penetrated the material
      materialRemoved - - [mm] length of travel in the material

    • addCuttingToolProfiles

      public static void addCuttingToolProfiles​(List<uk.ac.cf.milling.objects.CuttingToolProfile> profiles)
      Parameters:
      profiles - - cutting tool profiles to add as batch

    • getCuttingToolProfile

      public static uk.ac.cf.milling.objects.CuttingToolProfile getCuttingToolProfile​(int toolId, double distanceFromNose, double distanceFromCentre)
      Parameters:
      toolId - - the tool that the profile refers to
      distanceFromNose - - distance from the nose of the tool
      distanceFromCentre - - distance from the central axis of the tool
      Returns:
      the profile at the specified position

    • getCuttingToolProfiles

      public static List<uk.ac.cf.milling.objects.CuttingToolProfile> getCuttingToolProfiles​(int toolId, boolean axialProfile, boolean radialProfile)
      Parameters:
      toolId - - tool to return the profiles for
      axialProfile - - if this is an axial profile
      radialProfile - - if this is a radial profile
      Returns:
      - the cutting tool profile for the specified tool

    • getCuttingToolProfiles

      public static List<uk.ac.cf.milling.objects.CuttingToolProfile> getCuttingToolProfiles​(int toolId)
      Parameters:
      toolId - - tool to return the profiles for
      Returns:
      - all cutting tool profiles for the specified tool

    • updateCuttingToolProfile

      public static void updateCuttingToolProfile​(int toolId, double distanceFromNose, double distanceFromCentre, int insertionsPerTooth, double materialRemoved)
      Parameters:
      toolId - - the tool that the profile refers to
      distanceFromNose - - distance from the nose of the cutting tool
      distanceFromCentre - - local radius of the tool
      insertionsPerTool - - number of times that each tooth penetrated the material
      materialRemoved - - length of travel in the material

    • updateCuttingToolProfiles

      public static void updateCuttingToolProfiles​(List<uk.ac.cf.milling.objects.CuttingToolProfile> profiles)
      Parameters:
      profiles - - profiles to update as batch

    • updateCuttingToolProfilesFromTool

      public static void updateCuttingToolProfilesFromTool​(List<uk.ac.cf.milling.objects.CuttingTool> cuttingTools)
      Parameters:
      cuttingTools - - list of cutting tools to update their profile in the database

    • deleteCuttingToolProfile

      public static void deleteCuttingToolProfile​(int toolId, double distanceFromNose, double distanceFromCentre)
      Parameters:
      toolId - - the tool that the profile refers to
      distanceFromNose - - distance from the nose of the cutting tool
      distanceFromCentre - - local radius / distance from the centre of the tool

    • deleteCuttingToolProfiles

      public static void deleteCuttingToolProfiles​(int toolId)
      Parameters:
      toolId - - the tool to remove related profiles
